name: Level Seven Threat
text:
You may flip to hero form. Choose:
Exhaust Blue Marvel → discard this obligation.
Deal yourself a facedown encounter card. This card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Unshackle Creation
text: Anti-Man's cosmic awareness has shattered his perception of reality. He plans to unite mankind through acts of destruction and terror. Hinder 2[per_hero]. [hazard]

name: Anti-Man
text: Toughness. Forced Interrupt: When you generate a [energy] resource, take 1 damage. (Blue Marvel's nemesis minion.)

name: Anti-Matter Explosion
text: When Revealed: Choose to either spend [energy][energy] resources or assign 2[per_hero] damage among heroes and allies. [star] Boost: Deal 1 damage to each character you control.

name: Quantum Immortality
text: When Revealed: Heal all damage from Anti-Man and give him a tough status card. If you cannot, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Anti-Man and reveal him. Anti-Man activates against you.
